content: What do people expect? There are only so many low/minimal skill type jobs out there and when the comnomy slows, those get cut real quick. I have been asking this question for years on these boards during immigration debates. What happens when the economy slows? Well, now we are seeing. If they are not citizens and can not pay the bills, they need to return home. I am against any sort of economic assistance for citizens of other countries.
